A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The trailer gave me goosebumps\, I purchased the tickets 2 months ago. The film had loads of potential\, but it came up short. sure\, it was a good looking film\, but is that hard nowadays? 3 hours\, not a single moment moved me emotionally\, and finn's \"Im not gunna run this time\" moment? really? Little to no character development\, no struggle\, no entertaining fight scene. I hate when a movie's sole purpose is to set up a sequel\, and that's exactly what happened here. Rian Johnson\, Disney and Co will laugh all the way to the bank while they take our collective 2 billion dollars\, and right when I get over it\, they will drop a teaser trailer for a star wars story. \n\nSpoiler summary- She moves small rocks\, wastes 3 hours of your time\, then moves big rocks. End scene.
